text: @NYGovCuomo @Andy Why don’t you promise that the stats on Covid-19 deaths are accurate. There is list of reporting that the CDC is saying a death can be counted as Covid even if it is something else or just based on patient having some symptoms. Count only cases where it is #1 COD
